name: FEB - Brazilian Elite Force
description:
After an alien arives in Brazil, the brazilian army created the FEB - Brazilian Elite Force, a high tech agency with only the best of the bests. Choose one of three agents: Samanta, Zolrys and Silva, and save Brazil from an alien invasion in this 2D platform/shooter game.

Features:


- 3 playable characters;
- 5 levels, each one with a challenging Boss;
- 1 level in the shmup style;
- Rock/Metal original soundtrack;
- Face waves of enemies in the Survival Mode.
